comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.newkaliningrad.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.newkaliningrad.ru%2F) ### Comment > Не блокируется реклама в браузере Хром на Андроиде с рекомендациями настроек - отключить ДНС Гугл и предзагрузка страниц. ВПН не влияет. С ним и без него реклама есть. ``` Username: @Влад ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jvnml10nrlwkosgs4o40kccc40sssccpd2uvviygys.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kvadf8fjx4gs80sww0oc80ksoc0woco3anw6idihu8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS DNS setup: | Device or router settings DNS server: | Private AdGuard DNS server System version: | `Andriod 16` Browser: | Chrome Blocklists: | General:
AdGuard DNS,
AWAvenue Ads Rule,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist,
1Hosts (Lite)

comment.body:
С помощью DNS эту рекламу можно заблокировать, но только если заблокировать домен yandex.ru (без поддоменов). В фильтрах это сделать не можем, т.к. он используется не только для рекламы, и сломаются некоторые сервисы Яндекса.

Но это можно сделать с нашим приватным DNS adguard-dns.io

comment.body:
> Пропускает рекламу. Есть как отдельное приложение для ПК, так и расширение в браузере. Раньше можно было правой кнопкой мыши на рекламе нажать, выбрать "Браузерный помощник AdGuard" и нажав "блокировать рекламу" выбрать в ручную какой элемент и в каком размере надо убрать. Эта функция исчезла и не работает, даже после обновления программы и расширения.

C вашими настройками должна блокироваться программой. Попробуйте переустановить программу.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body:
The anti-adblock issue should be resolved in version `5.1.143` (released today).
Please try to update the extension manually.

comment.body:
Had the same issue as @rakleed 
Crafted this small rule set to hide these header ads

```
! hides the header's image
www.kinopoisk.ru##div[aria-hidden="true"][data-tid] > img[src^="https://kinopoisk-ru.clstorage.net/"]:remove-attr(/srcset|src/)
! removes advertisement's the url block
www.kinopoisk.ru##a[aria-label="presentation"]
! restores the header's height
www.kinopoisk.ru##div[aria-hidden="true"][data-tid]:style(height:74px !important;)
```

issue.title: Reporting a large list of suspicious browser fingerprinting scripts
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Hello. I have a system that crawls top domains and collects browser API usage data. Building on prior research that measures entropy exposed by browser APIs, the system estimates the entropy gathered by each script. Using this approach, I got an extensive list of scripts that are suspicious for browser fingerprinting, like scripts I reported `https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20author%3Ajsu6`. I wonder if there is any way I can contribute this list to AdgraudTeam without reporting them individually? I am glad to answer any questions related to it. 

Also, for the scripts I reported `https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20author%3Ajsu6`, I saw some of them are still open. Is there any reason why they are still open rather than closed as false positives or resolved?

### Proposed solution

NA

### Additional information

_No response_

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://dtf.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdtf.ru) ### Comment > С сегодняшнего дня абсолютно при каждом обновлении страницы вылезает этот банер. При попытке создать пост, что бы это сделать приходится нажимать кнопку назад, закрытие банера обновляет страницу и он появляется снова. issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.cbc.ca/player/play/9.6863788](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cbc.ca%2Fplayer%2Fplay%2F9.6863788) ### Comment > In the CBC News android app (and its French counterpart, RC Info) the videos embedded in news article are blocked, because of an ad preroll that isn't bypassed by adguard. > Workaround (equally inconvenient) currently is to either: > - disable adguard temporarily and refresh page to allow for ad to load, and reenable immediately, it will allow the video to be played directly afterwards, without ads. > - share video to get permalink, open the link in a web browser where the preroll ad is correctly blocked without affecting the video content. ``` Username: @SpoiledSneeze ``` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://goo.gl/app/maps/mhYZrKSKWr1gWgc98?g_st=atm&_nr=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgoo.gl%2Fapp%2Fmaps%2FmhYZrKSKWr1gWgc98%3Fg_st%3Datm%26_nr%3D1)
### Comment
> Hi support team,
> 
> Thank you for your great service. I'm using it to protect my privacy and reduce the number of ads on my devices, and it works very well, except for one problem with Google Maps on my Android and iOS devices. If I share my Google Maps bookmarks via a link or if I receive a link shared with me from Google Maps, when I click on it, the DNS request to Google seems to be blocked by AdGuard, and I cannot open any link until I turn it off, which is really inconvenient. Could you please fix the Google-related Maps services to prevent them from being blocked? Otherwise, the functionality of Google Maps when using AdGuard is incomplete.
> 
> In the attachment, you will find a video where I reproduce the bug:
> https://drive.proton.me/urls/BDJYXHAMHC#YMg0XbWpJdzY
> 
> Best wishes,
> Bogdan

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973
